page.title: 19A CHILD'S DAY
page.content: Mum wakes me up at about half past seven. I wash and have my breakfast at a quarter to eight. After breakfast I get ready for school and walk across the common with mum and my little sister Hannah, who is five.School starts at nine o'clock. At playtime I usually have a biscuit. At dinnertime i have a packed lunch, but some children have a school meal. In my packed lunch box I have cheese and tomato sandwiches, a rock bun, an orange and a drink. For tea I sometimes have spaghetti bolongese followed by a banana yoghurt which mum makes by mashing a banana and putting it in plain yoghurt. In between tea and supper I play with my sister or my friends. For supper I have a biscuit and some milk and then I go to bed, but I have a bedtime story. Catherine Daniels (8)
